definitions.definition: a serious disease that is caused when cells in the body grow in a way that is uncontrolled and not normal, killing normal cells and often causing death:
a harmful activity that spreads quickly:
examples: Drug abuse is a cancer that is destroying our society.

definitions.definition: the fourth sign of the zodiac, relating to the period from 22 June to 22 July and represented by a crab, or a person born during this period
